Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Morse
ShortDescription:
Red Line trains are standing at Morse due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.
Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Morse due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
